item.description:
Nancy Dean will be leading this hike RAIN or SHINE..
We'll start the walk at 9:30 and finnish about 11:30 or 12.
After the hike I hope you can join all of us for lunch at a great place a few miles from the trail, Finders Pub located at 171 West Boylston St. (Rt. 12) in West Boylston.
Their menu is HUGE, The food is great, and the prices are LOW plus they have FREE pop corn and salted peanuts!

As always there is NO "Maybe" RSVP choice (for my events anyways). Since there isn't an RSVP limit OR deadline if unsure RSVP the day before the event.

If you can't make the hike join us at Finder's at about 12-12:30.
Call Nancy if you're joining us late or for lunch.
(508)612-5989
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Blue Pontiac Sunfire
item.name: Hike on The Mass Central Rail Trail
